title: San Francisco/Chinatown-North Beach
name: Buster's
directions: corner of Columbus Ave and Vallejo St
content: Another classic late-night spot for the inebriated and starving.  The sign outside says that they have the best Philly-cheese steaks in the city... almost certainly not true, but with its fresh ingredients, itâ€™s pretty good nonetheless.  They also do a very good burger at a reasonable price.  Friendly staff and open late to cater to the party crowd.
